description:
Perfect Hideaway/Beach House
Take advantage of this very large home with views over the Red Rocks area. Set over two levels that cater for a very large family or the perfect beach house. With an excellent holiday rental history the perfect investment awaits; figures can be provided. This quiet pocket is ideal to escape the mad rush of Melbourne and to entertain family and friends in style. A gentle walk to the Red Rocks beach is the perfect way to start or finish the day. An inspection is a must...you'll be surprised!!

Fantastic Opportunity in the Heart of Cowes
This home is located only minutes from the Cowes shopping centre and a short stroll to Cowes North facing beaches and boasts small views of the bay from the deck!
The home offers three bedrooms, one central bathroom and laundry with side access to the backyard, and a central kitchen. The split level home has a huge upstairs North facing living space with pitch ceiling and exposed beams.
This property offers huge potential including a bungalow at the rear with a bedroom, living area, bathroom and kitchenette. Use this space to generate income either permanent or holiday rental, as it is separately metred.
Additional features of the property include wood fire, spacious North facing balcony, a clear run for boat/caravan storage, split system and huge double garage which you could use as an alternative space for entertaining.
In total the property offers four bedrooms, two bathrooms, two living spaces and so much potential.
Inspect now to secure a fantastic investment opportunity!

Make yourself at home
Situated at the end of a quiet street, this home offers fantastic potential for renovations, holiday home or an investment property. For an investor it offers a great opportunity as it is currently permanently let.
Sitting on a generously sized allotment of 680sqm approx, this well presented property features three bedrooms, one bathroom, and a spacious living/dining/kitchen area with timber lined cathedral ceilings.
A spacious deck overlooks the farmlands - a great place to entertain or unwind. There is plenty of room for cars/boats/caravans, and also ample storage for tools bikes and beach equipment in the garden shed.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Titled Seagrove Lot- close to parkland
This titled block of land is located in the prestigious Seagrove estate. The level 392 square metre (approx.) block is ready to build on and includes concrete crossover.
Take advantage of the new Federal Government Home Builder Grant - Applicable for any new build for contracts entered into from June 4th 2020 to the 31st December 2020!
Enjoy the first class amenities this estate provides including 3 parks, playground, walking tracks and scenic lake, as well as piped LPG gas to the block, the only estate on Phillip Island to provide this service.
All services including NBN, mains and recycled class A water, sewer, power and LPG gas are available to the block, including concrete crossover.
Located only 700 metres to Cowes North facing bay beaches and walking distance to the Cowes shopping centre and schools. Enquire today.

Large unit/small home
To all the downsizers out there, this is perfect. 
A homely feel located in the central CBD of Cowes, not far from the restaurants, shopping strip, beach, schools, bowling and golf club.
All you need at your front door.
Beautifully presented, the open floor plan immediately displays a feeling of space, continuing through the lounge/dining to a large kitchen complete with dishwasher and a window out to the back courtyard.  A sliding door from the dining area also leads out to the rear entertaining space, plenty of room for the BBQ and furniture, which is north facing making the whole unit airy and bright.
The second living zone consists of three bedrooms and a bathroom which are behind closed doors.
Easy internal access to the single garage attached is a bonus, with a remote door.
For private inspection please call Jenni Kent:  0428566643

Beach Within Reach!
This impeccable home is located in a highly sought after location just minutes walking distance to the beautiful Cowes North facing beach.
Situated on a spacious block of 606sqm, on a quiet street central to Cowes with low maintenance gardens, this 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom brick home is soaked in natural light, would be ideal for holiday, permanent living or as an attractive investment opportunity.
Being brick, and solidly built - very little ongoing maintenance would be required. Holiday home owners will love this location, within walking distance from the North facing Cowes beach, shops, cafe's and supermarkets. Plenty of room for the car, caravan, boat or visitors!
Additional features of the property include a single lock up garage, wood fire in the second living space, fully fenced spacious backyard, ample off street parking.
Potential as a permanent residence offering convenience, being close to amenities, schools, sporting facilities and public transport.
Contact us today to organise a private or virtual inspection.

LOCATION IS EVERYTHING AND HERE IT IS
WE ARE OPEN. INSPECTIONS BY APPOINTMENT. CALL US TODAY!
This luxury 5 bedroom foreshore residence offers unobstructed views over WESTERNPORT BAY and offers opportunities for every buyer.
It's one of those properties that ticks the boxes for every buyer that is looking for a premium residence to a great holiday rental and with approved plans a fantastic development opportunity!
It is situated perfectly only a few meters from the beach and only a minute's walk Cowes shops, restaurants and Supermarkets.
The property offers 5 spacious bedrooms and 3 bathrooms across multiple levels and a central swimming pool creating the perfect entertaining space for you and your guests.
PERMIT APPROVED BEACHFRONT DEVELOPMENT OPPORTUNITY
- Permit approved for 20 apartments comprising 10 two bedroom apartments and 10 three bedroom apartments
- Substantial 5 bedroom / 3 bathroom modern residence with central swimming pool ideal as a family home or holiday house
- Generous north facing landholding of 1,186m2* zoned General Residential
- Uninterrupted views over parkland, Cowes Beach and Western Port Bay
- Short term holding income
- Located directly opposite Cowes Beach foreshore and approximately 100 metres from Cowes retail precinct
Call Alex Scott Cowes to arrange your private inspection 5952 5633

BRAND NEW TOWNHOUSE ROOM FOR THE BOAT
The lower level offers a cosy lounge room with a northerly aspect, split system air conditioning/heating offering year around comfort. The hostess kitchen is a real treat and central to this unique property that offers plenty of cupboard space, dishwasher and large stone bench tops, with big picture windows for warmth and natural light. The master bedroom is located on this level with full ensuite facilities and a walk in shower. A powder room just off the huge laundry area gives you the 3rd amenities area. With access into your new townhouse through the laundry via the remote control garage.

Central Cowes Living!
Situated in a highly sought-after location, this coastal tri level home is the ideal holiday getaway, family home or investment property.
Boasting plenty of street appeal with tidy yet low maintenance surrounds and a North facing front balcony, this three-bedroom, three-bathroom residence offers all the ambience of seaside living.
Combining simplicity with functionality, the home offers an open plan living/kitchen/dining area upstairs with gas cooktop/electric oven and reverse cycle air conditioner.
The middle level comprises of the master bedroom with ensuite and walk in robe and two further bedrooms with built in robes, bathroom, separate toilet, laundry and ample storage cupboards.
The downstairs second living area could be utilised as a fourth bedroom as it is complete with ensuite and robe.
All of this is set within a 729sqm approx. allotment with ample car accommodation for boats/caravan/trailers and a double carport. The spacious, fully fenced back yard is complete with a large garden shed/workshop.
Only a short stroll to the Cowes main street, primary schools, doctors and Cowes Golf Club - this residence allows you to enjoy the pleasures of a convenient location.
This property in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island

Superb location, close to parkland with views!
This superb four bedroom home is located in the stunning Shearwater Estate, close to parkland and playgrounds, a short stroll to Cowes & Silverleaves beaches and to the Phillip Island Golf Club!
The home has been lovingly decorated by the current owners and the ground floor comprises of three bedrooms (all with built in robes), living room that extends out to north facing decking area, bathroom with freestanding bath, vanity and separate shower, a separate toilet, laundry with built in storage, and bench and a double garage with remote door.
The first floor consists of a second living area that opens onto a balcony that overlooks the park area, a hostess kitchen with walk in pantry, 900mm electric oven and cooktop, an island bench with stainless steel dishwasher, and dining area that opens onto a north facing entertaining deck. There is also a second powder room and master bedroom with ceiling fan, ensuite and walk in robe.
All rooms feature plantation shutters, polished floorboards to living spaces and carpet to bedrooms, and each floor is air conditioned by reverse cycle split systems.
The 590m2 (approx) yard is fully fenced and beautifully landscaped featuring fabulous spa to relax in and every man's dream, a three bay shed, currently set up as a man cave, tool shed and storage with a 2000L water tank for the garden. This property would make an ideal family home or holiday escape. Inspection is sure to impress.
Contact us today to organise a private or virtual inspection.

Block in Shearwater Cowes
A very desirable area with parks, playgrounds, bridges over wetlands complete with swans, purple hens and geese, a natural wonderland.
Take advantage of the new Federal Government Home Builder Grant - Applicable for any new build for contracts entered into from June 4th 2020 to the 31st December 2020!
A ten minute walk will find you at Silverleaves north facing pristine beach, IGA at the end of Settlement Road and close to Cowes CBD, Schools, Bowls Club, Golf Course and all central facilities available.
422m2 is the best space to build your permanent seachange or investment property.
Call Jenni Kent
0428566643

ESTABLISHED AREA OF COWES LARGE 700M2 (Approx) ALLOTMENT
This allotment is situated in an established part of Cowes and in a quite court with in walking distance to the local primary school, shops and nature reserve. This allotment has a full northerly aspect to the front. This is a great place to build that brand new home or subdivide and build 2 brand new townhouses (Subject to council approval).

Beach home perfection in quiet location
Located only 500 metres walking distance from Cowes foreshore beach, this single level property would make an ideal family or holiday home.
Nestled in a quiet street location, this home features a secure front sun room entry which opens onto a spacious lounge with original timber flooring, split system, ceiling fan and large windows, overlooking the front deck and garden.
The kitchen is well designed with generous bench space, freestanding electric cooktop and oven, plenty of storage cupboards and a pantry. The home offers 3 bedrooms, all with carpet and 2 with built in robes.
The main bathroom features a spacious floor level shower and separate toilet. There is also a second bathroom with laundry, shower and separate toilet which can be accessed from the sun room entry and the rear patio, perfect for rinsing off after a day at the beach. An abundance of windows and original timber flooring provide a spacious light filled aspect to the home.
Located on a generous 623sqm (approx.) allotment, this property is fully fenced with established gardens and lawn area. The rear yard is fully enclosed, with a fabulous outdoor undercover entertaining area. A single lock up garage and additional garden/tool shed or workshop.
This property offers an excellent entry level, holiday or investment opportunity. Inspect today to secure this exceptional property.

"PICTURE PERFECT ISLAND COTTAGE"-$387,000
The perfect package with plenty of potential. This quaint two-bedroom cottage sits on a low maintenance 603 sqm of open lawn framed by established trees.
Neatly presented and freshly painted with updated kitchen, bathroom and reverse cycle air conditioner, the home comprises an open plan living/dining zone, second toilet and is light and bright throughout with timber floorboards and a distinct coastal vibe.
Set on an enviable sized block with a detached lock up garage with car space and workshop area, the property offers the perfect beach cottage escape with possibilities for future expansion.
Quietly located and within moments to Red Rocks Beach and The Aussie Golf Ranch; this well-presented home is a few minutes’ drive from the main strip of Cowes; delivering an ideal beach house getaway or permanent seaside home handy to the township and local schools and kindergartens.
Garth Lisle Property Consultants are open 7 days and welcome your enquiry.

Views Forever
We finally have the perfect beach hideaway, with views forever and low maintenance with secure undercover car parking. Direct lift access for all generations. Excellent access to all of Cowes beaches and shops. There is the potential of holiday rental income, or just relax and enjoy all the foreshore activity with family and friends.

POSITION PERFECT!!!
Have you ever dreamt about finding your forever, sleek and minimalist home in a quiet cul-de-sac where you just unpack sit back and relax. Welcome to 2 Killara Close Cowes!
This 4 bedroom home is set on a spacious 619m2 block and is only a short walk to the local school, medical facilities, and shopping centre.
The open plan kitchen dining and living room forms the heart of the home, set upstairs and opens onto the entertaining deck. The master suite is located upstairs with the rumpus room and three other bedrooms downstairs.
This home will make you the envy of all your friends and family. With a short stroll to the boutiques, cafes, restaurants and not to mention the picturesque beaches.
- 4 bedrooms with BIR
- Main with WIR and ensuite
- Air conditioned living and dining areas
- Well-appointed and equipped kitchen, plenty of cupboard space and large pantry
- Good size main bathroom with shower and bath with separate toilet
- Lounge leads out onto a deck ready for entertaining
- Private parking off street with a remote double garage
- Fully fenced and secure yard
So don't delay it, book an inspection time today.

Driftwood Dreaming
Located just 400 metres to Red Rocks Beach and set on a generous 727 square metre allotment at the end of a quiet court. This superior property boasts four bedrooms, two living areas, two bathrooms and is the one you have been dreaming of.
On the upper floor, the architecturally designed atrium is stunning. It provides the kitchen/living and dining with an abundance of natural light and style. Set in tones of refreshing white and pops of colour the kitchen features quality appliances, gas hotplates, dishwasher and electric oven. Stainless steel bench tops, splashback and island provide a modern edge. The living area features a cosy woodfire and double doors with plantation shutters that opens onto a large balcony with water glimpses. A spacious master, complete with ensuite and robes complete the upper level.
The lower level features polished timber floors throughout, three spacious bedrooms all with built in robes and a relaxing bathtub surrounded by windows and gorgeous views. The living area has glass sliding doors leading out to a sunny north facing deck all leading out to landscaped gardens and a separate double garage.
In a quiet location at the end of a court and only a short stroll to the beach, it's a wonderful opportunity to secure a beautiful family home, beach house, permanent or holiday rental!
Contact us today to organise a private or virtual inspection.

ELEGANT HOME WITH WATER VIEWS
This BRAND NEW home has it ALL!!!, Set on a large beautifully landscaped allotment, this magnificent home offers 2 very large living zones, 3 large double bedrooms,
2 bathrooms (Master with a full ensuite and walk in robe)
As you walk in your new residence you are greeted with the 1st large living area that flows through to the kitchen, dining area and 2nd large living area, with a northerly aspect it is a great place to enjoy the warmth of the winter sun. The Alfresco dining area is accessed via the 2nd living room - a great place to relax and enjoy the long summer evenings with family and friends.
Access to the home and back yard can also be gained via the large double garage

Titled Land- Opposite Parkland
This West facing block of land boasts parkland views in the prestigious Seagrove estate. The level 412 square metre (approx.) is titled and ready to build on.
Take advantage of the new Federal Government Home Builder Grant - Applicable for any new build for contracts entered into from June 4th 2020 to the 31st December 2020!
Enjoy the first class amenities this estate provides including 3 parks, playground, walking tracks and scenic lake, as well as piped LPG gas to the block, the only estate on Phillip Island to provide this service.
All services including NBN, mains and recycled class A water, sewer, power and LPG gas are available to the block. Located only 700 metres to Cowes North facing bay beaches and walking distance to the Cowes shopping centre and schools. Enquire today.

Quality Home, Quality Location
Located in a leafy, tightly held, quiet street only 100 meters to the beach this brand new large stunning home is ready to move straight in.
With space for entertaining in mind the large open plan living area features soaring ceilings, over sized double glazed doors and highlight windows throughout to let the natural light in and flows seamlessly to the outdoor alfresco with built in Webber BBQ,bar fridge and large landscaped low maintenance rear yard.The huge quality kitchen features two pack finishes with Ceasarstone benches and splash backs along with all the functional elements you would expect in a house of this league.
This home also is fully air conditioned and heated
It has four very large bedrooms with built in custom mirrored robes, the master with ensuite and walk through robe. Three bathrooms in total all with quality fixtures and fittings throughout including custom vanities with Ceasarstone bench tops and splash backs. Adding to this a second living space opening onto a protected courtyard, conveniently placed study to work from home plus remote electric gate and double remote garage with custom cedar feature timber door.
If you are looking for either a stunning permanent home or upmarket holiday house make it a must inspect property.
Contact us today to organise a private or virtual inspection.

A neat and comfortable package!
Appealing to holiday makers or permanent residents, this single level home is a short stroll to the popular Red Rocks beach and a short drive to all Cowes has to offer.
Boasting spacious central living zone, separate timber kitchen/dining area, three bedrooms, sunroom and a fully renovated family bathroom.
There is also a bungalow which could be converted into a fourth bedroom/studio/home office that is fitted with a split system heating/cooling unit.
Other great features include split system heating/cooling, single garage, single carport with roller door, fruit trees, veggie garden and a front undercover entertainment area with a wood fire/pizza oven.
All of this is set within a 583sqm (approx) corner allotment with private, low maintenance surrounds.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.
